notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data are freely available from the following institutional data access for researchers who meet the criteria. 1. IMPETUS Project ( http://geonetwork.impetus.uni-koeln.de/srv/en/main.home); 2. AMMA-CATCH ( http://bd.amma-catch.org/main.jsf); 3. CCAFS ( http://gisweb.ciat.cgiar.org/MarkSimGCM/).
